授業の概要・背景:
This course meets twice a week.
The purpose of this course is to build on oral English skills acquired in SBE Speaking & Listening L2. Students who test into this course should have confidence handling complex speaking and listening projects, and should be able to perform well in large discussions. By the end of the course, students’ oral skills should be polished to the point where they could function in an academic environment in an English-speaking country.
授業方法: This course focuses mainly on listening to sample lectures from the textbook. However, students can expect daily pair and group assignments, as well as presentations and discussion projects.
